description:
The DiffWebLinkInfo entity extends WebLinkInfo and describes a link on a diff screen to an external site.

https://gerrit-review.googlesource.com/Documentation/rest-api-changes.html#diff-web-link-info

Example:
    https://gerrit-review.googlesource.com/Documentation/rest-api-changes.html#get-edit-meta-data
    {
        "show_on_side_by_side_diff_view": true,
        "name": "side-by-side preview diff",
        "image_url": "plugins/xdocs/static/sideBySideDiffPreview.png",
        "url": "#/x/xdocs/c/42/1..0/README.md",
        "target": "_self"
    }

tooltip.description: Tooltip to show when hovering over the link. Using "Open in $NAME_OF_EXTERNAL_TOOL" is a good option here.
tooltip.title: Tooltip

image_url.description: URL to the icon of the link.
image_url.title: Image Url

show_on_side_by_side_diff_view.description: Whether the web link should be shown on the side-by-side diff screen.
show_on_side_by_side_diff_view.title: Show On Side By Side Diff View

show_on_unified_diff_view.description: Whether the web link should be shown on the unified diff screen.
show_on_unified_diff_view.title: Show On Unified Diff View

title: DiffWebLinkInfo
